quest.name: Rational Thinking
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol has a passion for rations.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid scorpions at the HuskDeliver the splendid scorpions to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid wild berries at the HuskDeliver the splendid wild berries to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid piranha in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid piranha to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Once we descend into the caverns, you'll appreciate that it isn't always practical to return to the surface to satisfy every bodily whim.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: In light of this, I provide our workers with some rations to take with them, and I'd be grateful if you could assist me by obtaining an ingredient.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Scorpions are what I require─three ought to do nicely. You will find them if you search in the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Wild berries are what I require─three handfuls ought to do nicely. You will find them growing in the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: A piranha is what I require─just one ought to do nicely. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta, but you'll need to be handy with a spear.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: As they say, MistressMaster Forename, one can't work on an empty stomach─much less when one isn't down in the caverns. So please, bring me the ingredient.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: That's three scorpions I require, good madamsir. You will find them if you search in the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: That's three handfuls of wild berries I require, good madamsir. You will find them growing in the Husk.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: That's a piranha I require, good madamsir. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Welcome back, MistressMaster Forename. Did your procurement efforts meet with success?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oho, such lively scorpions these are! And this one almost stung me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be stinging anyone after I've fried it up to a crisp, oh no.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oho, such plump, juicy berries these are! I shall press them to make invigorating drinks for our workers in the event they can't readily find groundwater.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oho, such a lively piranha this is! And it almost took a bite out of me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be biting anyone after I've cleaned out its guts and hung it up to dry, oh no.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: With that, I shall set about the preparations at once. My thanks for your kind assistance, good madamsir!
